title: The Hot Mess: Disaster Class
description: For the friends who are always late, always lost, or always causing a scene. Who is the biggest liability?

cards.content: Most likely to drop their phone in the toilet?
Most likely to trip over nothing while walking on a flat surface?
Most likely to lock themselves out of their house/car?
Most likely to send a screenshot to the person they were gossiping about?
Most likely to burn water while cooking?
Most likely to sleep through 10 alarms?
Most likely to arrive an hour late to everything?
Most likely to fall in love with a walking red flag?
Most likely to get drunk off one drink?
Most likely to spill a drink on a stranger?
Most likely to break a glass at a party?
Most likely to lose their wallet on a night out?
Most likely to forget their own birthday?
Most likely to walk into a glass door?
Most likely to get lost even with Google Maps open?
Most likely to accidentally like an ex's photo from 3 years ago?
Most likely to drunk text their boss?
Most likely to cry in public for no reason?
Most likely to get kicked out of an Uber?
Most likely to choke on their own saliva?
Most likely to forget someone's name while introducing them?
Most likely to buy something expensive and regret it 5 minutes later?
Most likely to get a tattoo with a spelling error?
Most likely to show up to the wrong location for a date?
Most likely to wear a shirt inside out all day without noticing?
Most likely to lose their passport immediately before a trip?
Most likely to miss a flight because they were eating?
Most likely to accidentally set something on fire?
Most likely to invite themselves to a party?
Most likely to overshare with a cashier?
Most likely to ghost someone they really liked by accident?
Most likely to eat food that expired a week ago?
Most likely to fall asleep on the toilet?
Most likely to reply to a text 3 months later?
Most likely to laugh at a funeral?
Most likely to have the messiest room in the group?
Most likely to have 5,000 unread emails?
Most likely to ignore the 'Check Engine' light for a year?
Most likely to break their phone screen once a month?
Most likely to go to the grocery store for milk and come back with $100 of snacks?
Most likely to accidentally insult a child?
Most likely to pee their pants from laughing?
Most likely to send a naughty text to the family group chat?
Most likely to get a haircut and immediately cry?
Most likely to fall off a chair while sitting still?
Most likely to get scammed by an internet bot?
Most likely to forget where they parked their car?
Most likely to wear mismatched shoes?
Most likely to ruin a surprise party?
Most likely to sustain an injury while sleeping?
Most likely to be the 'drama queen/king'?
Most likely to verify their age on a website by scrolling to 1890?
Most likely to get sunburned indoors?
Most likely to pull a 'push' door?
Most likely to leave the stove on?
Most likely to try a DIY project and destroy their house?
Most likely to dye their hair a crazy color during a mental breakdown?
Most likely to adopt a pet they can't take care of?
Most likely to get fired for something incredibly dumb?
Most likely to quit a job after one day?
Most likely to accidentally steal something from a store?
Most likely to wave at a stranger thinking they know them?
Most likely to have spinach in their teeth for an entire date?
Most likely to clog a toilet at a friend's house?
Most likely to vomit in an Uber?
Most likely to lose their voice from screaming at a concert?
Most likely to think a stripper actually likes them?
Most likely to pass out with their shoes on?
Most likely to get banned from Tinder?
Most likely to accidentally call 911?
Most likely to get stuck in a piece of clothing while trying it on?
Most likely to accidentally flash someone?
Most likely to have the weirdest Google search history?
Most likely to eat something off the floor?
Most likely to be the first one to die in a zombie apocalypse?
Most likely to trust a Nigerian Prince email?
Most likely to give themselves a bad haircut?
Most likely to break a tooth opening a bottle?
Most likely to sing the wrong lyrics to a very popular song?
Most likely to run out of gas on the highway?
Most likely to accidentally injure themselves while dancing?
Most likely to order a pizza to their old address?
Most likely to lose their credit card twice in one month?
Most likely to show up to a costume party without a costume?
Most likely to be the loudest person in the room?
Most likely to spill coffee on their white shirt?
Most likely to fall for a fake news article?
Most likely to forget to pack underwear for a trip?
Most likely to leave their phone in the fridge?
Most likely to introduce themselves to the same person twice?
Most likely to send a voice note that is 10 minutes long?
Most likely to get a noise complaint from neighbors?
Most likely to try a fad diet and quit after 3 hours?
Most likely to borrow money and forget to pay it back?
Most likely to have a panic attack over nothing?
Most likely to ruin a group photo by blinking?
Most likely to accidentally spit while talking?
Most likely to say 'You too' when the waiter says 'Enjoy your meal'?
Most likely to high-five someone who was waving?
Most likely to argue with a bot online?
